title: 3dToyProg
description: A program to illustrate dataset creation and manipulation in C using AFNI's API.

mask_dataset.title: Mask dataset
mask_dataset.description: Restrict analysis to non-zero voxels in the mask dataset

output_datum.title: Output datum type
output_datum.description: Output datum type for one of the datasets. Choose from 'float' or 'short'. Default is 'float'.

mini_help.title: Mini help flag
mini_help.description: Mini help, at time, same as -help in many cases.

extreme_help.title: Extreme help flag
extreme_help.description: Extreme help, same as -help in majority of cases.

help_view.title: Help view flag
help_view.description: Open help in text editor. AFNI will try to find a GUI editor on your machine. You can control which it should use by setting environment variable AFNI_GUI_EDITOR.

help_web.title: Help web flag
help_web.description: Open help in web browser. AFNI will try to find a browser on your machine. You can control which it should use by setting environment variable AFNI_GUI_EDITOR.

help_find.title: Help find flag
help_find.description: Look for lines in this program's -help output that match (approximately) WORD.

help_spx.title: Help sphinx flag
help_spx.description: Help string in sphinx loveliness, but do not try to autoformat.

help_aspx.title: Help autoformat sphinx flag
help_aspx.description: Help string in sphinx with autoformatting of options, etc.

help_all_opts.title: All options flag
help_all_opts.description: Try to identify all options for the program from the output of its -help option. Some options might be missed and others misidentified. Use this output for hints only.
